meanings.definition: Capable of giving rise to several different cell types.
meanings.sent1: The pluripotent stem cells could become many different kinds of cells.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying pluripotent cells to understand their versatility.
meanings.sent3: The pluripotent cells were like tiny shape-shifters in the lab.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was as pluripotent as a magic wand.
meanings.sent5: The pluripotent nature of the material amazed the researchers.

meanings.definition: Having the ability to develop into any type of cell in the body.
meanings.sent1: The pluripotent cells had the remarkable power to transform into any cell.
meanings.sent2: Doctors hope to use pluripotent cells for regenerative medicine.
meanings.sent3: The pluripotent cells seemed like tiny superheroes with shape-shifting abilities.
meanings.sent4: Her potential was as pluripotent as a chameleon's adaptability.
meanings.sent5: The pluripotent capabilities of the cells were truly extraordinary.

meanings.definition: Showing potential to differentiate into various cell types.
meanings.sent1: The pluripotent cells displayed promise in becoming different cell types.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are exploring the pluripotent nature of these cells.
meanings.sent3: The pluripotent cells were like a box of crayons waiting to be used.
meanings.sent4: Her talent was as pluripotent as a rainbow of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The pluripotent potential of the cells was a fascinating discovery.
